rows.character_text: I have been taking care of my grandchildren, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.f2_son_15.name, since their parents died when they were young. We often struggle with money, as I only receive a small grant.

character_text.eng: I have been taking care of my grandchildren, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.f2_son_15.name, since their parents died when they were young. We often struggle with money, as I only receive a small grant.

rows.character_text: I am so stressed. I don’t have any money left. And now I am fighting with my teens over things they want – again.

character_text.eng: I am so stressed. I don’t have any money left. And now I am fighting with my teens over things they want – again.

rows.character_text:
I want the best future for my grandchildren, but I do not know where to get the money. Loan sharks are dangerous and paying them back is so expensive.

I should save, but that feels impossible!

character_text.eng:
I want the best future for my grandchildren, but I do not know where to get the money. Loan sharks are dangerous and paying them back is so expensive.

I should save, but that feels impossible!

rows.character_text: My goal is to make sure my grandson can go to high school and my granddaughter can reach her dream of university. How can I save a lot of money with the little money I have?

character_text.eng: My goal is to make sure my grandson can go to high school and my granddaughter can reach her dream of university. How can I save a lot of money with the little money I have?

rows.character_text: I know – let’s start with a plan! First, let me make a budget – a plan for how I can save my money. Then I will save just a little bit of money at a time – I will even join a stokvel.

character_text.eng: I know – let’s start with a plan! First, let me make a budget – a plan for how I can save my money. Then I will save just a little bit of money at a time – I will even join a stokvel.

rows.character_text: I should also speak with my grandchildren to choose things that we can spend just a little bit less on each week. They will help me think of things we want but do not need.

character_text.eng: I should also speak with my grandchildren to choose things that we can spend just a little bit less on each week. They will help me think of things we want but do not need.

rows.character_text: Look, we reached our dreams! I did not borrow any money from friends or loan sharks. By saving a tiny bit each week, I managed to pay for @data.characters.f2_son_15.name’s high school and save some money for @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name’s university. I am so proud of this.

character_text.eng: Look, we reached our dreams! I did not borrow any money from friends or loan sharks. By saving a tiny bit each week, I managed to pay for @data.characters.f2_son_15.name’s high school and save some money for @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name’s university. I am so proud of this.

rows.character_text: One night there was a horrible storm that broke my roof. Everything was flooded. I suddenly had to find money to fix the roof. I just felt defeated.

character_text.eng: One night there was a horrible storm that broke my roof. Everything was flooded. I suddenly had to find money to fix the roof. I just felt defeated.

rows.character_text: You always come home late!

character_text.eng: You always come home late!

character_text.eng: I want you to have fun, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, but I’m also worried about you staying out late. Do you know why?

character_text.eng: That is right. It is also not safe in this area to be outside after sunset. What do you think would be a good time for you to be home?

character_text.eng: I could come home at 10pm?

character_text.eng: Maybe we can agree I will come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays?

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for coming home on time. After you finish your schoolwork, we can have your favourite meal for dinner.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for coming home on time. After you finish your schoolwork, we can have your favourite meal for dinner.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, have you done your homework?

rows.character_text: You are a really great dancer! Tell me about why you like Tiktok.

character_text.eng: You are a really great dancer! Tell me about why you like Tiktok.

rows.character_text:
I’m proud of how well you dance, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name. But we need to make sure you are safe.

I know your friends look at Tiktok, but with an open account, there are other people who look at videos of teenagers for their own sexual needs. Sometimes they contact teenagers. They pretend to be nice but end up threatening and abusing teens.

character_text.eng:
I’m proud of how well you dance, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name. But we need to make sure you are safe.

I know your friends look at Tiktok, but with an open account, there are other people who look at videos of teenagers for their own sexual needs. Sometimes they contact teenagers. They pretend to be nice but end up threatening and abusing teens.

rows.character_text:
Let’s look together online at how we can keep this fun for you but also safe. 

Look – you can make your account private and control who follows you. So you can accept people you know from school and our community, but not people you don't know.

Can we make a rule together that you can use Tiktok, but with a private account? I trust you to know who to accept!

character_text.eng:

character_text.eng: I’m proud of you, @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name!

character_text.eng: Sorry @data.characters.f1_father.role_name – you can go back to sleep.

character_text.eng: That’s unfair! You never listen to me!! I hate you!

character_text.eng: I am concerned that you are often still coming home late, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. What can we do to help you remember to come home in time?

character_text.eng: Oh come on, I know you have some ideas.

character_text.eng: You have to do your homework anyway. If you forget the rule, is it fair that you will not be able to see your friends the next day?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name! What time is it! It is late!

character_text.eng: My friends wanted me to stay longer. They were calling me a baby for having to go home already.

character_text.eng: I am sorry I worried you and @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Something happened when I was out with my friends @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name and @data.characters.friend_female_1.name!

character_text.eng: Hey beautiful. I have been looking at you for a while. You are very beautiful, what is your name?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, would you like to come with me to have something to drink and chips? Come on, get in, you will be back in time, I promise…

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, would you like to come with me to have something to drink and chips? Come on, get in, you will be back in time, I promise…

rows.character_text: You are lucky, my friend. I wish a man would ask ME out and buy me gifts. I am telling you, if you do not do this I’m going to tell everyone you are stupid!

character_text.eng: You are lucky, my friend. I wish a man would ask ME out and buy me gifts. I am telling you, if you do not do this I’m going to tell everyone you are stupid!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name do not go! Be careful! Let’s go home. It is dangerous to go with people you do not know. Besides, he is too old for you and what he is doing is wrong.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name do not go! Be careful! Let’s go home. It is dangerous to go with people you do not know. Besides, he is too old for you and what he is doing is wrong.

Pfff, I am so proud of you for not getting into the car. That was a dangerous situation, thank you for telling me!

You can always call me or talk to me when something like this happens. We can even use a Safety Word, so I know something is wrong - and I promise I will not be angry.

character_text.eng:

rows.character_text:
You are a good friend for being worried about her. Sending sexy photos is a real risk too.

Sometimes people are not who they say they are online – he could say he is your age but be a 50-year-old man. Or when they break up, he could send those photos to everyone and your friend would feel awful.

character_text.eng:

Sometimes people are not who they say they are online – he could say he is your age but be a 50-year-old man. Or when they break up, he could send those photos to everyone and your friend would feel awful.

character_text.eng: Shame my dear, you look really upset, do you want to tell me what happened?

rows.character_text: It’s my Uncle, he… he… he touched me.

character_text.eng: It’s my Uncle, he… he… he touched me.

character_text.eng: It is true, he… he… made me do it! He made me have sex with him! I did not want to, I swear, and I even said NO, but he told me I would be in trouble.

character_text.eng: Yesterday when you went to see your friend. He just came and that’s when it happened.

rows.character_text: Of course I will. And @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Remember this is not your fault. I love you. You are a good person. We will get through this.

character_text.eng: Of course I will. And @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Remember this is not your fault. I love you. You are a good person. We will get through this.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, you've looked worried since yesterday. What is wrong?

rows.character_text: Yesterday, my friends and I went to a soccer match. Some guys who were drunk started a fight with my friend.

character_text.eng: Yesterday, my friends and I went to a soccer match. Some guys who were drunk started a fight with my friend.

rows.character_text: I did not want to, but I could not just stand there and let them beat up my friend, so…

character_text.eng: I did not want to, but I could not just stand there and let them beat up my friend, so…

rows.character_text: Everyone was fighting. I saw someone lying on the field in a pool of blood. He looked… dead.

character_text.eng: Everyone was fighting. I saw someone lying on the field in a pool of blood. He looked… dead.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name.

rows.character_text: I have never done this before. And now they will expel me.

character_text.eng: I have never done this before. And now they will expel me.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I am so ashamed. I do not know what to do.

character_text.eng: I do not want to have a baby.

character_text.eng: The test said I have HIV. I am scared I am going to die.

rows.character_text: I don't think I am ready..

character_text.eng: Hey pretty, why are you walking so fast! Don’t you want to come show us what is under that skirt?

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I am so exhausted.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, why did you not cook dinner yet?! Why do I always have to do everything myself?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, why did you not cook dinner yet?! Why do I always have to do everything myself?

rows.character_text: Get out of my way!

character_text.eng: Get out of my way!

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) It has been such a hard day at school… I can’t wait for @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name to come home so I can tell her about it.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) It has been such a hard day at school… I can’t wait for @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name to come home so I can tell her about it.

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) I am so exhausted.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I am so exhausted.

rows.character_text: Hi everyone, I'm feeling exhausted and grateful to be home. @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, thank you for looking after your sister and washing the school clothes. I am going to wash my hands, and then we can cook together and you can tell me about your day.

character_text.eng: Hi everyone, I'm feeling exhausted and grateful to be home. @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name, thank you for looking after your sister and washing the school clothes. I am going to wash my hands, and then we can cook together and you can tell me about your day.

character_text.eng: I am glad we have this time together. I actually wanted to tell you about a problem I had at school today.

character_text.eng: I want to play dress-up!

character_text.eng: Thank you, I love this scarf!

character_text.eng: Let’s play with the ball outside!

rows.character_text: I see that your hands are tight and you are speaking loudly. It looks like you are upset, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. It’s not easy, let’s practise a little bit more. I know you can do it.

character_text.eng: I see that your hands are tight and you are speaking loudly. It looks like you are upset, @data.characters.f3_daughter_7.name. It’s not easy, let’s practise a little bit more. I know you can do it.

rows.character_text: Okay.

character_text.eng: Okay.

rows.character_text: Yay!

character_text.eng: Yay!

rows.character_text: But I want it!

character_text.eng: But I want it!

rows.character_text: Ooooh yes!

character_text.eng: Ooooh yes!

rows.character_text: Build a house out of bed sheets!

character_text.eng: Build a house out of bed sheets!

rows.character_text: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

character_text.eng: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

rows.character_text: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?

character_text.eng: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?

rows.character_text: I am just going to get my book quickly!

character_text.eng: I am just going to get my book quickly!

rows.character_text: No, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. I’m so, so sorry for breaking the vase… I didn’t see it.

character_text.eng: No, @data.characters.f3_uncle.role_name. I’m so, so sorry for breaking the vase… I didn’t see it.

rows.character_text: Yes, I should have listened. I continued running even after you asked me to walk in the house.

character_text.eng: Yes, I should have listened. I continued running even after you asked me to walk in the house.

rows.character_text: Okay…

character_text.eng: Okay…

rows.character_text: No. Not yet!

character_text.eng: No. Not yet!

rows.character_text: No, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! I don’t want to! I’m not finished with my game.

character_text.eng: No, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name! I don’t want to! I’m not finished with my game.

rows.character_text: But I still have so much homework to do!

character_text.eng: But I still have so much homework to do!

rows.character_text: Maybe I can start earlier?

character_text.eng: Maybe I can start earlier?

rows.character_text: I'll start now, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. Could you help me with this one problem? I was having trouble with it yesterday.

character_text.eng: I'll start now, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name. Could you help me with this one problem? I was having trouble with it yesterday.

rows.character_text: Well done, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. I’m proud that we figured that problem out together. Now you can be well-rested for tomorrow, and your homework is done!

character_text.eng: Well done, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name. I’m proud that we figured that problem out together. Now you can be well-rested for tomorrow, and your homework is done!

rows.character_text: Don't you talk back to me!

character_text.eng: Don't you talk back to me!

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) That child is always making trouble.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) That child is always making trouble.

rows.character_text: No I don’t, I don’t even know what late means! Stop nagging me.

character_text.eng: No I don’t, I don’t even know what late means! Stop nagging me.

rows.character_text: Because you want me to have enough time for my schoolwork?

character_text.eng: Because you want me to have enough time for my schoolwork?

rows.character_text: That is a bit late, what about 6pm?

character_text.eng: That is a bit late, what about 6pm?

rows.character_text: Yes, great. From now on, our household rule is that you need to come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays. But you always walk home with a friend. Okay?

character_text.eng: Yes, great. From now on, our household rule is that you need to come home at 6pm on school nights and 10pm on Fridays and Saturdays. But you always walk home with a friend. Okay?

rows.character_text: Thank you very much, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for helping to come up with a good rule together. I am proud to see how responsible you are getting.

character_text.eng: Thank you very much, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, for helping to come up with a good rule together. I am proud to see how responsible you are getting.

rows.character_text: Just a minute @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, I’m finishing this Tiktok video.

character_text.eng: Just a minute @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, I’m finishing this Tiktok video.

rows.character_text: All my friends are on it, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. I have more than 600 likes and 120 followers.

character_text.eng: All my friends are on it, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. I have more than 600 likes and 120 followers.

rows.character_text: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

character_text.eng: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, you broke our rule! I will give you a hiding!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, you broke our rule! I will give you a hiding!

rows.character_text: If I come home in time, maybe I can stay up 30 minutes later than usual?

character_text.eng: If I come home in time, maybe I can stay up 30 minutes later than usual?

rows.character_text: (mumbles) Mgmluuhm...

character_text.eng: (mumbles) Mgmluuhm...

rows.character_text: Okay…. What about, I have to do my homework?

character_text.eng: Okay…. What about, I have to do my homework?

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name.

rows.character_text: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

character_text.eng: It is WAY past the time you were supposed to be home!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, it is the middle of the night and you came home later than we agreed. Whatever the reason is, you must understand that this is not acceptable. Your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name and I felt really worried.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_18.name, it is the middle of the night and you came home later than we agreed. Whatever the reason is, you must understand that this is not acceptable. Your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name and I felt really worried.

rows.character_text: I know it can be hard to say no to your friends. Let’s talk more about this in the morning when we have had some rest.

character_text.eng: I know it can be hard to say no to your friends. Let’s talk more about this in the morning when we have had some rest.

rows.character_text: Thank you. Now go to bed, but just to be clear, as you came home later than we agreed, you will not be allowed to go out tomorrow night.

character_text.eng: Thank you. Now go to bed, but just to be clear, as you came home later than we agreed, you will not be allowed to go out tomorrow night.

rows.character_text: Tell me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

character_text.eng: Tell me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

rows.character_text: Her name is @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

character_text.eng: Her name is @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name.

rows.character_text: I am not sure if that is a good idea…

character_text.eng: I am not sure if that is a good idea…

rows.character_text: I just do not know…

character_text.eng: I just do not know…

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! Our Safety Word could be ‘blue house’. I could call and say something like ‘I forgot my book at the blue house’ and you would know to come help me.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! Our Safety Word could be ‘blue house’. I could call and say something like ‘I forgot my book at the blue house’ and you would know to come help me.

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) Take a deep breath... What does my child need? She needs me to be calm and listen.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) Take a deep breath... What does my child need? She needs me to be calm and listen.

rows.character_text: Thank you for sharing this with me. You are not in trouble. This is not your fault.

character_text.eng: Thank you for sharing this with me. You are not in trouble. This is not your fault.

rows.character_text: It is okay, I believe you my child. This is a big thing and we will find a way to get the help we need. Where could we go for help?

character_text.eng: It is okay, I believe you my child. This is a big thing and we will find a way to get the help we need. Where could we go for help?

rows.character_text: Yes… Okay… But will you come with me?

character_text.eng: Yes… Okay… But will you come with me?

rows.character_text: Continue, I am listening. I hope you did not fight?

character_text.eng: Continue, I am listening. I hope you did not fight?

rows.character_text: So, did you fight in order to help defend your friend?

character_text.eng: So, did you fight in order to help defend your friend?

rows.character_text: I am glad you are telling me about this, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. Let’s discuss whether we should involve the police or someone else to help.

character_text.eng: I am glad you are telling me about this, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. Let’s discuss whether we should involve the police or someone else to help.

rows.character_text: We will get through this. Remember, we will support you as a family.

character_text.eng: We will get through this. Remember, we will support you as a family.

rows.character_text: Oh come on... We are ready for the next step. We see each other all the time and we never do anything more… You know I love you, right!

character_text.eng: Oh come on... We are ready for the next step. We see each other all the time and we never do anything more… You know I love you, right!

rows.character_text: No, you are staying here. You always leave me alone to go see your friends. Don’t you love me? Or are you meeting your other boyfriend?!

character_text.eng: No, you are staying here. You always leave me alone to go see your friends. Don’t you love me? Or are you meeting your other boyfriend?!

rows.character_text: Uhmmm... I don’t…

character_text.eng: Uhmmm... I don’t…

rows.character_text: My friend also needs support. Can I invite her too?

character_text.eng: My friend also needs support. Can I invite her too?

rows.character_text: Your friends left, so this is the only way you can get home, you idiot!

character_text.eng: Your friends left, so this is the only way you can get home, you idiot!

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, you can call me when you are ready.

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, you can call me when you are ready.

rows.character_text: Thank you for telling me. I am sure we can come up with a solution together.

character_text.eng: Thank you for telling me. I am sure we can come up with a solution together.

rows.character_text: Wear it, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!

character_text.eng: Wear it, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name!

rows.character_text: Great idea! What do we need to do first?

character_text.eng: Great idea! What do we need to do first?

rows.character_text: Hmm, this is the third night in a row that you haven’t gone to bed on time because of homework.

character_text.eng: Hmm, this is the third night in a row that you haven’t gone to bed on time because of homework.

rows.character_text: Shall we make a rule that you start your homework half an hour after you get home from school? That way, you can finish it and have some time to eat and relax before bed, too!

character_text.eng: Shall we make a rule that you start your homework half an hour after you get home from school? That way, you can finish it and have some time to eat and relax before bed, too!

rows.character_text: Of course, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name.

character_text.eng: Of course, @data.characters.f2_son_8.name.

rows.character_text: Come and sit down next to me. Take your time, I am listening.

character_text.eng: Come and sit down next to me. Take your time, I am listening.

rows.character_text: My school?

character_text.eng: My school?

rows.character_text: Yes, she’ll have it!

character_text.eng: Yes, she’ll have it!

rows.character_text: No, this will be our secret. You don't want people to think you are stupid, right?

character_text.eng: No, this will be our secret. You don't want people to think you are stupid, right?

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f2_grandfather.role_name.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, come and play with me and my dolls!

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I am feeling so stressed. Let me take a deep breath... Phewww… Maybe I can finish cooking and then take a few minutes to play with @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. It will take my mind off all these worries.

rows.character_text: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

character_text.eng: Alright, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, let me finish dinner quickly, and then I will come play with you.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?

character_text.eng: What a pretty doll you have, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name. Does she have a name?

rows.character_text: Hmmm, I will name her @data.characters.doll_name.name!

character_text.eng: Hmmm, I will name her @data.characters.doll_name.name!

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) What a day. I have a lot on my plate, but I am still standing and trying my best every day. Tomorrow, I should visit with my friends so we can catch up and be reminded that we aren't alone!

rows.character_text: You found one striped sock and one with dots. Let’s find socks that match.

character_text.eng: You found one striped sock and one with dots. Let’s find socks that match.

rows.character_text: Another sock! This one is white. It’s frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many clothes to look through.

character_text.eng: Another sock! This one is white. It’s frustrating to try to find a matching pair when there are so many clothes to look through.

rows.character_text: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.

character_text.eng: You are being very patient and looking very hard, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name. Well done for trying. I am happy you are helping me.

rows.character_text:
You found two socks with the same pattern! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to do?

character_text.eng:
You found two socks with the same pattern! Well done for not giving up, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name! 

Because you helped me so well, I now have 5 extra minutes to play with you. What would you like to do?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, it is important that you get your homework done so you can do well in school. Let’s make a rule about watching TV so that you have enough time for homework, too.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, it is important that you get your homework done so you can do well in school. Let’s make a rule about watching TV so that you have enough time for homework, too.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: What do you think would be a fair rule?

character_text.eng: What do you think would be a fair rule?

rows.character_text: Hmmm… Maybe I can watch TV as much as I want, but only after I do my homework?

character_text.eng: Hmmm… Maybe I can watch TV as much as I want, but only after I do my homework?

rows.character_text: I like that idea, but let’s limit it to 30 minutes per day so that you have time for other fun and relaxing things too. How does that sound?

character_text.eng: I like that idea, but let’s limit it to 30 minutes per day so that you have time for other fun and relaxing things too. How does that sound?

rows.character_text: That’s okay.

character_text.eng: That’s okay.

rows.character_text:
Thank you for doing your homework before watching TV, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. 
Last night, you mentioned that your math tests have become easier for you. I am proud of you! We can increase your TV time to 45 minutes each day… as long as you still do your homework first.

character_text.eng:
Thank you for doing your homework before watching TV, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name. 
Last night, you mentioned that your math tests have become easier for you. I am proud of you! We can increase your TV time to 45 minutes each day… as long as you still do your homework first.

rows.character_text: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name!

character_text.eng: Thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name!

rows.character_text: I am so happy to see you playing quietly with your building blocks, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to get ready for bed. When you are ready for bed, we can read a story together.

character_text.eng: I am so happy to see you playing quietly with your building blocks, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. In 5 minutes, it will be time to get ready for bed. When you are ready for bed, we can read a story together.

rows.character_text: Okay!

character_text.eng: Okay!

rows.character_text: Time to get ready for bed, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. First, let’s get you nice and clean with a bath.

character_text.eng: Time to get ready for bed, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. First, let’s get you nice and clean with a bath.

rows.character_text: You were so well-behaved in the bath, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Now it is time to put your pyjamas on.

character_text.eng: You were so well-behaved in the bath, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name. Now it is time to put your pyjamas on.

rows.character_text: Well done for putting on your pyjamas by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Now let’s brush your teeth. Make sure you get the ones in the back of your mouth too!

character_text.eng: Well done for putting on your pyjamas by yourself, @data.characters.f2_daughter_3.name! Now let’s brush your teeth. Make sure you get the ones in the back of your mouth too!

rows.character_text: You did so well getting ready for bed! Now, we have time to read a story. Which book would you like to read?

character_text.eng: You did so well getting ready for bed! Now, we have time to read a story. Which book would you like to read?

rows.character_text: Yay! Can you read me the story about the lion?

character_text.eng: Yay! Can you read me the story about the lion?

rows.character_text: “The end…” I’m glad you chose that story for us to read, it’s one of my favourites! Goodnight, my dear. I love you very much.

character_text.eng: “The end…” I’m glad you chose that story for us to read, it’s one of my favourites! Goodnight, my dear. I love you very much.

rows.character_text: Goodnight, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Goodnight, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, where did you get that thing?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_13.name, where did you get that thing?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.man_threat.name bought it for me. It’s a nice phone, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. It takes great photos!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.man_threat.name bought it for me. It’s a nice phone, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. It takes great photos!

rows.character_text: I don’t want to see that expensive thing! That boy is no good! How does he think you are going to repay him for this?!

character_text.eng: I don’t want to see that expensive thing! That boy is no good! How does he think you are going to repay him for this?!

rows.character_text: That’s not how it works, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! That’s not fair!

character_text.eng: That’s not how it works, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name! That’s not fair!

rows.character_text: I do not want to hear it!

character_text.eng: I do not want to hear it!

rows.character_text: You are not even trying to listen to me! I do not know why I even try with you!

character_text.eng: You are not even trying to listen to me! I do not know why I even try with you!

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) Ay my poor feet! I need to sit down for a moment and drink a cup of coffee before I start preparing food for everyone.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) Ay my poor feet! I need to sit down for a moment and drink a cup of coffee before I start preparing food for everyone.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f2_son_15.name! What are you doing? That bread is for dinner! Now there will not be enough for us all!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f2_son_15.name! What are you doing? That bread is for dinner! Now there will not be enough for us all!

rows.character_text: Sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, I was just hungry. I can explain, you see, there is this guy at school...

character_text.eng: Sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, I was just hungry. I can explain, you see, there is this guy at school...

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) Take a pause… just breathe…

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) Take a pause… just breathe…

rows.character_text: Just give me a moment. I am tired and now worried about having enough food for dinner.

character_text.eng: Just give me a moment. I am tired and now worried about having enough food for dinner.

rows.character_text: I am sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

character_text.eng: I am sorry, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Now tell me, why are you so hungry? Did you not eat your lunch at school?

character_text.eng: Now tell me, why are you so hungry? Did you not eat your lunch at school?

rows.character_text: That is the problem. There is a guy at school who bullies me. He says if I do not give my lunch to him every day, he and his friends will hurt me. He makes me so mad!

character_text.eng: That is the problem. There is a guy at school who bullies me. He says if I do not give my lunch to him every day, he and his friends will hurt me. He makes me so mad!

rows.character_text: I am sorry to hear that but am glad that you told me, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. It does not mean that you can eat everybody’s dinner. After we speak, you need to go to the shop to buy some more bread. But first, what do you think we should do about the bully problem?

character_text.eng: I am sorry to hear that but am glad that you told me, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. It does not mean that you can eat everybody’s dinner. After we speak, you need to go to the shop to buy some more bread. But first, what do you think we should do about the bully problem?

rows.character_text: Well… I want to just hit him or get him back.

character_text.eng: Well… I want to just hit him or get him back.

rows.character_text: Hmmm… what do you think will happen to you if you do that?

character_text.eng: Hmmm… what do you think will happen to you if you do that?

rows.character_text: I don’t know. He is bigger than me so he will probably hurt me more. And I could get into trouble at school and get expelled.

character_text.eng: I don’t know. He is bigger than me so he will probably hurt me more. And I could get into trouble at school and get expelled.

rows.character_text: Yes, that could happen. What could we do instead?

character_text.eng: Yes, that could happen. What could we do instead?

rows.character_text: I guess I could tell the teacher. But then the other kids will call me a snitch. Maybe you could talk to the teacher?

character_text.eng: I guess I could tell the teacher. But then the other kids will call me a snitch. Maybe you could talk to the teacher?

rows.character_text: That sounds like a better idea. I could also have a word with his parents if you want me to.

character_text.eng: That sounds like a better idea. I could also have a word with his parents if you want me to.

rows.character_text: Sure. If you think that would help too. Thanks, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Sure. If you think that would help too. Thanks, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Anything for you, my dear. I will do it first thing after dinner. And you know? If that does not work, we can always try something else together.

character_text.eng: Anything for you, my dear. I will do it first thing after dinner. And you know? If that does not work, we can always try something else together.

rows.character_text: Thanks, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Thanks, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name.

rows.character_text: How are things going at school now?

character_text.eng: How are things going at school now?

rows.character_text: It is going better, the boy does not take my lunch anymore. But he is still being really mean to me.

character_text.eng: It is going better, the boy does not take my lunch anymore. But he is still being really mean to me.

rows.character_text: I am sorry to hear that, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. Shall I ask your uncle to go talk to his parents? If that does not work, we will try something else!

character_text.eng: I am sorry to hear that, @data.characters.f2_son_15.name. Shall I ask your uncle to go talk to his parents? If that does not work, we will try something else!

rows.character_text: Yes, thank you, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name. At least I know you are on my side.

character_text.eng: Yes, thank you, @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name. At least I know you are on my side.

rows.character_text: You cannot go out for the next month

character_text.eng: You cannot go out for the next month

rows.character_text: Uuugh… that’s so unfair, I did not do anything wrong!

character_text.eng: Uuugh… that’s so unfair, I did not do anything wrong!

rows.character_text: I am not trying to accuse your friend or be jealous. I am worried that when someone gives a gift it is hard to say 'no' when they ask something in return – like sex. If you want to have a phone, we will save up together so you can make your own decisions without owing him anything.

character_text.eng: I am not trying to accuse your friend or be jealous. I am worried that when someone gives a gift it is hard to say 'no' when they ask something in return – like sex. If you want to have a phone, we will save up together so you can make your own decisions without owing him anything.

rows.character_text: That makes sense, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: That makes sense, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: This makes me realise we should talk about boyfriends and protecting yourself. Many teens your age get pregnant or become HIV positive. Let’s go to the clinic so you can talk with the nurse to learn how you can stay safe.

character_text.eng: This makes me realise we should talk about boyfriends and protecting yourself. Many teens your age get pregnant or become HIV positive. Let’s go to the clinic so you can talk with the nurse to learn how you can stay safe.

rows.character_text: Okay, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: Okay, thank you, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: I miss @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name so much...

character_text.eng: I miss @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name so much...

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f4_daughter_13.name, you need to stop crying. It has been months already! This crying will not bring your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name back and you are doing worse and worse in school!

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f4_daughter_13.name, you need to stop crying. It has been months already! This crying will not bring your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name back and you are doing worse and worse in school!

rows.character_text: You just don't understand how I feel! You never listen!

character_text.eng: You just don't understand how I feel! You never listen!

rows.character_text: Stop being so dramatic! Your behaviour is unacceptable!

character_text.eng: Stop being so dramatic! Your behaviour is unacceptable!

rows.character_text: I know you are sad, @data.characters.f4_daughter_13.name. I also miss @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. What do you think we can do to help you feel better?

character_text.eng: I know you are sad, @data.characters.f4_daughter_13.name. I also miss @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name. What do you think we can do to help you feel better?

rows.character_text: Maybe we can visit @data.characters.f4_aunt.name, so we can share stories about @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name?

character_text.eng: Maybe we can visit @data.characters.f4_aunt.name, so we can share stories about @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name?

rows.character_text: Where are you going looking like that?

character_text.eng: Where are you going looking like that?

rows.character_text: I like that idea, let’s go see her on Saturday. Do you already want to tell me more about how you feel now?

character_text.eng: I like that idea, let’s go see her on Saturday. Do you already want to tell me more about how you feel now?

rows.character_text: I am going out with some of my friends.

character_text.eng: I am going out with some of my friends.

rows.character_text: I honestly feel angry that she left. Is it okay to say that?

character_text.eng: I honestly feel angry that she left. Is it okay to say that?

rows.character_text: What is that @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Condoms? Why are you carrying those in your bag? Where did you get them?!

character_text.eng: What is that @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name? Condoms? Why are you carrying those in your bag? Where did you get them?!

rows.character_text: I got it from one of the girls at school today. We were talking about safe sex and she said she uses birth control so that she does not get pregnant.

character_text.eng: I got it from one of the girls at school today. We were talking about safe sex and she said she uses birth control so that she does not get pregnant.

rows.character_text: Yes, it is normal to feel angry. We all have different feelings at different times, and that is okay. It is good to talk about this together, thank you for sharing with me.

character_text.eng: Yes, it is normal to feel angry. We all have different feelings at different times, and that is okay. It is good to talk about this together, thank you for sharing with me.

rows.character_text: What is this talk of sex in my house! You are too young…

character_text.eng: What is this talk of sex in my house! You are too young…

rows.character_text: But @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, it’s not like that…!

character_text.eng: But @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, it’s not like that…!

rows.character_text: No, no, no, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name! I will not have this discussion with you. Is that what you do at school? Talking about things not suited for your age instead of focusing on school? You won’t go out with those friends of yours anymore. You want to bring shame in this home. Come here now! I am going to hit you. Stupid girl!

character_text.eng: No, no, no, @data.characters.f2_daughter_19.name! I will not have this discussion with you. Is that what you do at school? Talking about things not suited for your age instead of focusing on school? You won’t go out with those friends of yours anymore. You want to bring shame in this home. Come here now! I am going to hit you. Stupid girl!

rows.character_text: No @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, please don’t hit me, it is not what you think!

character_text.eng: No @data.characters.f2_grandmother.role_name, please don’t hit me, it is not what you think!

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, can I talk to you about something?

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name, can I talk to you about something?

rows.character_text: (_calmly_) Sure, my darling. What is the matter?

character_text.eng: (_calmly_) Sure, my darling. What is the matter?

rows.character_text: @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name wants us to study together tomorrow. I really like him but I am not sure what to do.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name wants us to study together tomorrow. I really like him but I am not sure what to do.

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking to herself_) How has my daughter grown up so fast? What now? Take a deep breath…

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking to herself_) How has my daughter grown up so fast? What now? Take a deep breath…

rows.character_text:
(_calmly_) Thank you for sharing this with me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I know that you like @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name a lot, he is a charming boy and he does great at school, but you are only 16 and he is 18.

I feel worried that it is not safe for you to be alone with him. He might pressure you into doing something that you are not prepared to do.

I don’t want to tell you who you can see but we need to have some rules about how you spend time together.

character_text.eng:
(_calmly_) Thank you for sharing this with me, @data.characters.f1_daughter_16.name. I know that you like @data.characters.boyfriend_1.name a lot, he is a charming boy and he does great at school, but you are only 16 and he is 18.

I feel worried that it is not safe for you to be alone with him. He might pressure you into doing something that you are not prepared to do.

I don’t want to tell you who you can see but we need to have some rules about how you spend time together.

rows.character_text: What do you think would be a fair rule about how you spend time together?

character_text.eng: What do you think would be a fair rule about how you spend time together?

rows.character_text: How about, we can spend time together if there is an adult with us?

character_text.eng: How about, we can spend time together if there is an adult with us?

rows.character_text: That would be fine as long as his parents also know. I will chat with his mother when I see her later today. And after you get back, we can talk about how it went.

character_text.eng: That would be fine as long as his parents also know. I will chat with his mother when I see her later today. And after you get back, we can talk about how it went.

rows.character_text: _(hugs @data.characters.f1_mother.name)_ Okay. Thank you for coming up with a plan together, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

character_text.eng: _(hugs @data.characters.f1_mother.name)_ Okay. Thank you for coming up with a plan together, @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name.

rows.character_text: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

character_text.eng: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

rows.character_text: Leave me alone and mind your own business!

character_text.eng: Leave me alone and mind your own business!

rows.character_text: What did I do? You never listen!

character_text.eng: What did I do? You never listen!

rows.character_text: I said leave me alone or you will get a beating!

character_text.eng: I said leave me alone or you will get a beating!

rows.character_text: Look! I have made a house!

character_text.eng: Look! I have made a house!

rows.character_text: Who cares about your stupid house!

character_text.eng: Who cares about your stupid house!

rows.character_text: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

character_text.eng: Can I have money to buy some airtime?

rows.character_text: *(taking a breath)* I’m sorry son. I had a difficult day today. The boss fired me.

character_text.eng: *(taking a breath)* I’m sorry son. I had a difficult day today. The boss fired me.

rows.character_text: Oh no! I need a new school uniform.

character_text.eng: Oh no! I need a new school uniform.

rows.character_text: I’ll try, son, and your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name's job will help us get by while I look for another job.

character_text.eng: I’ll try, son, and your @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name's job will help us get by while I look for another job.

rows.character_text: Should I also help you look for work, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name?

character_text.eng: Should I also help you look for work, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name?

rows.character_text: No it’s okay, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. I appreciate your offer. The most important thing is that you work hard at school. Thanks for listening to me.

character_text.eng: No it’s okay, @data.characters.f1_son_18.name. I appreciate your offer. The most important thing is that you work hard at school. Thanks for listening to me.

rows.character_text: Let’s play some soccer together. It will help me get this stress off my mind for a bit.

character_text.eng: Let’s play some soccer together. It will help me get this stress off my mind for a bit.

rows.character_text: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name!

character_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f1_father.role_name!

rows.character_text: Don’t tell the adults, but I am going to a bar with my friends tonight.

character_text.eng: Don’t tell the adults, but I am going to a bar with my friends tonight.

rows.character_text: Have fun! I told them I am staying with my girlfriend, but I am actually going to a cool party.

character_text.eng: Have fun! I told them I am staying with my girlfriend, but I am actually going to a cool party.

rows.character_text: I think they are dealing drugs. We could all get arrested. But I can’t tell my parents – they will be so angry!

character_text.eng: I think they are dealing drugs. We could all get arrested. But I can’t tell my parents – they will be so angry!

rows.character_text: I am scared. Everyone is too drunk to drive me home. This guy says he will take me, but he wants us to go to his house first. I can’t tell my parents – I lied about coming to this party.

character_text.eng: I am scared. Everyone is too drunk to drive me home. This guy says he will take me, but he wants us to go to his house first. I can’t tell my parents – I lied about coming to this party.

rows.character_text:
I care about your safety more than anything. If you are ever upset, or scared, you can always call me for help, or tell me about it.

Shall we use an imaginary ‘Aunty Cecilia’ as our Safety Word? Just say something about Aunty Cecilia, I promise that I will try my best to help and I will not be angry – even if you are doing something you shouldn't be doing.

character_text.eng:
I care about your safety more than anything. If you are ever upset, or scared, you can always call me for help, or tell me about it.

Shall we use an imaginary ‘Aunty Cecilia’ as our Safety Word? Just say something about Aunty Cecilia, I promise that I will try my best to help and I will not be angry – even if you are doing something you shouldn't be doing.

rows.character_text: Hey @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, how is Aunty Cecilia doing now?

character_text.eng: Hey @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, how is Aunty Cecilia doing now?

rows.character_text: *(on the other side of the phone)* Not well. We need you at home. I will come pick you up right away. Where are you?

character_text.eng: *(on the other side of the phone)* Not well. We need you at home. I will come pick you up right away. Where are you?

rows.character_text: (🤔_thinking_) I think my friends are in trouble. I don’t want to stop being their friend, but I’m worried. Maybe @data.characters.f1_father.role_name knows what to do.

character_text.eng: (🤔_thinking_) I think my friends are in trouble. I don’t want to stop being their friend, but I’m worried. Maybe @data.characters.f1_father.role_name knows what to do.

rows.character_text: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I just remembered, Aunty Cecilia said she will come visit tomorrow.

character_text.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.role_name, I just remembered, Aunty Cecilia said she will come visit tomorrow.

rows.character_text: *(on the other side of the phone)* Okay, I need you at home to help get things ready. I will come pick you up now. Where are you?

character_text.eng: *(on the other side of the phone)* Okay, I need you at home to help get things ready. I will come pick you up now. Where are you?

rows.character_text: That looks fun! What are you watching?

character_text.eng: That looks fun! What are you watching?

rows.character_text: This guy on TikTok gets a million likes on every post! My friends and I make our own videos too.

character_text.eng: This guy on TikTok gets a million likes on every post! My friends and I make our own videos too.

rows.character_text: That’s exciting! What do you like about making videos yourself?

character_text.eng: That’s exciting! What do you like about making videos yourself?

rows.character_text: It’s fun to create them with my friends. And people comment on them a lot. I already have 600 followers!

character_text.eng: It’s fun to create them with my friends. And people comment on them a lot. I already have 600 followers!

rows.character_text: Wow, that must feel great. It’s exciting when other people like what we do. At the same time, it is important to make sure Tiktok is fun and safe for you. Do you have any ideas of how we could do that?

character_text.eng: Wow, that must feel great. It’s exciting when other people like what we do. At the same time, it is important to make sure Tiktok is fun and safe for you. Do you have any ideas of how we could do that?

rows.character_text: Sometimes I get mean comments, or DMs from people I don’t even know. Maybe I should block them?

character_text.eng: Sometimes I get mean comments, or DMs from people I don’t even know. Maybe I should block them?

rows.character_text: Yes, that’s a really good idea. Do you know how to block people? We can look it up together if you like? I am sure there are other steps too, like making your account private or limiting who can comment.

character_text.eng: Yes, that’s a really good idea. Do you know how to block people? We can look it up together if you like? I am sure there are other steps too, like making your account private or limiting who can comment.

rows.character_text: Yes, let’s look it up together, thank you @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name

character_text.eng: Yes, let’s look it up together, thank you @data.characters.f1_mother.role_name

rows.character_text: I am glad we can talk about this, @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. If something ever feels wrong, remember you can always come to me. We will figure it out together, and you can keep enjoying TikTok safely.

character_text.eng: I am glad we can talk about this, @data.characters.f1_son_14.name. If something ever feels wrong, remember you can always come to me. We will figure it out together, and you can keep enjoying TikTok safely.

rows.character_text: (_thinking_) I am so worried about Lerato. She has been acting differently lately. She seems quiet and keeps to herself.

character_text.eng: (_thinking_) I am so worried about Lerato. She has been acting differently lately. She seems quiet and keeps to herself.

rows.character_text: Mother, guess what happened at school. My classmate Sima shared a sexy picture of herself with her boyfriend to prove that she loves him, and his friends told him to post it online. Now it is everywhere.

character_text.eng: Mother, guess what happened at school. My classmate Sima shared a sexy picture of herself with her boyfriend to prove that she loves him, and his friends told him to post it online. Now it is everywhere.

rows.character_text: (thinking): What if my friends and family see those other pictures I sent… I don’t know what to do! Maybe I should talk to my father.

character_text.eng: (thinking): What if my friends and family see those other pictures I sent… I don’t know what to do! Maybe I should talk to my father.

rows.character_text: Why is your son showing my daughter those pictures at school!

character_text.eng: Why is your son showing my daughter those pictures at school!
